mapper.sql: id, user_id, content, images, type, status, like_count, comment_count, view_count, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (user_id, content, images, type, status, like_count, comment_count, view_count) VALUES (#{userId}, #{content}, #{images}, #{type}, #{status}, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET like_count = like_count - 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND like_count > 0
